
<h1> Features 🔆 </h1>

• Changed Bot's Search API to api.abirhasan.wtf
• 1337x Search Bug Fixed
• ThePirateBay Search Bug Fixed
• Added YTS Search Support
• Added Anime Torrents Search Support
